    .ca-redirect {
    > div {
        a {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
            min-width: px-to-rem(100px);
            text-align: center;
            margin: 0 auto px-to-rem(30px) auto;
        }
    }

    svg {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        max-width: px-to-rem(110px);
        height: auto;
        margin: 0 auto px-to-rem(15px) auto;
    }

    @media (min-width: 22.5em) {
        text-align: center;

        > div {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: space-between;

            a {
                width: calc(50% - #{px-to-rem(15px)});
                margin: 0;
            }
        }
    }
}
